reviewtext: I am an avid runner, and for some reason ear buds don't stay in my ears.  They fall out almost as soon as I stand up.  So when running I use these over-the-head headphones.  My old ones broke, so I looked online for a decent pair.  I found these at a dirt-cheap price and was somewhat skeptical.Well, after training for two marathons and running hundreds of miles, these headphones held up very well and I have no complaints.  They stay in position even while I'm running, and the sound is very good.  I don't need any fancy bass or other audio features.  I just want to listen to the music on my phone.Everything worked great!  A very good value.
